Welcome to our world

At Metis Ireland, we help busy high achievers to get really important stuff done, by creating a long-term financial and lifestyle plan that helps you live the life you want. It’s your plan, for life. We’re here to understand you and where you want to go, so we’ll spend most of our time talking about you.

 

You’re not here to listen to us banging on about ourselves.

 

Still, at some point it’s useful to know a bit about what we stand for. If you decide we’re the wealth planners for you, we’ll be sitting beside you, or at the other end of a phone for years to come, so we’d like to give you a bit of insight into what we’re all about and how we see our own future.

 

When we launched in 2014 we made a promise to do things differently. We’d take the time to listen before we did anything else – and it turns out it’s a real eye opener when you ask questions, give people the space to reply, and listen to what they tell you.

 

Five years on, we’re still doing things differently – this year we announced a really exciting strategic investment in Metis Ireland by the Davy Group. The group will acquire a 50% shareholding in Metis Ireland, which marks a whole new chapter in our story. In short, it means we now have the resources and the flexibility to expand what we do, to continue the rewarding relationships we’ve built up, and embark on many more.

 

But some things haven’t changed at all. Exceptional service, lasting relationships, and a commitment to providing honest, experienced financial planning – those will always stay the same.
